scenario.name: 01-A 3 way call - A->G Metaswitch CFS SIPREC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:7603213214@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Content-Length: [len] Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, BYE, REGISTER, OPTIONS, PRACK, UPDATE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, INFO, PUBLISH Require: siprec Contact: <sip:[field0 file="tenant-users.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port];+sip.src Allow-Events: message-summary, refer, dialog, line-seize, presence, call-info, as-feature-event, calling-name Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary=metaswitch-boundary Expires: 180 P-Asserted-Identity: <sip:[field0 file="tenant-users.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 832544241 INVITE Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="tenant-users.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] Organization: Metaswitch Networks Supported: resource-priority, siprec, 100rel Max-Forwards: 70 To: <sip:7603213214@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>
--metaswitch-boundary Content-Type: application/sdp
v=0 o=- 3449405261 3449405261 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP4 [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=ptime:20 a=label:1
--metaswitch-boundary Content-Disposition: recording-session Content-Type: application/rs-metadata
